attributes.action: take heed of The Sun campaign to make football match tickets more affordable for true fans.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "take heed of The Sun campaign to make football match tickets more affordable for true fans."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11658.asp

Prime Minister's Office
